info.title: AlignPath APIs
info.description: RESTful APIs for AlignPath, offering endpoints for authentication, user management, and personalized career recommendations with their corresponding quests, problems, skills and resources.

recommendation_id.description: ID of the recommendation to accept
ID of the recommendation to dismiss

post.summary: Get career recommendations from AI agent

404.description: No preferences found for the user

502.description: AI agent failed to return recommendations

post.summary: Generate quests for a given career path

career.description: The career path for which to generate quests

path_id.description: The ID of the path to associate the quests with

502.description: AI agent failed to generate quests

post.summary: Generate quests and problems for a given career path

career.description: The career path for which to generate quests and problems

path_id.description: The ID of the path to associate the quests and problems with

200.description: Successful response with generated quests and problems

question.example: Given an array of integers, sort the array in ascending order.

502.description: AI agent failed to generate quests and problems

post.summary: Send messages to the Gemini AI model for chat completion

messages.description: An array of messages in the chat history

system.description: Optional system instruction for the AI model

maxOutputTokens.description: Optional maximum number of output tokens

reply.example: I am doing well, thank you!

raw.description: Raw response from the Gemini API

post.summary: Store or update authenticated user's preferences
